actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include community mental health centers among the entities which may be qualified providers of services for medicare purposes, to redefine terms used in such title so as to reflect such inclusion.

summary.text: Includes community mental health centers among the facilities which may be qualified providers of services under Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include community mental health centers among the entities which may be qualified providers of services for medicare purposes, to redefine terms used in such title so as to reflect such inclusion.
